title: LG has started rolling out stable Android 12 to the T-Mobile LG V60
content:
Even though LG no longer makes Android smartphones, the company is doing a decent job of keeping its existing models up to date. Over the last few weeks, it has rolled out stable Android 12 releases for multiple variants of the LG Velvet. And now, it’s rolling out a similar update for the LG V60.

The post LG has started rolling out stable Android 12 to the T-Mobile LG V60 appeared first on XDA.
description: LG has started rolling out the stable Android 12 update for the T-Mobile variant of the LG V60. Read on to learn more about the update.
